name: DroneBlocks
description: DroneBlocks teaches STEM and the real-world application of drone technology through our free app, online curriculum, and professional development services.

company_updates_collection.description:
30+ New video lessons are Available for the DroneBlocks Mars Simulator Course!

DroneBlocks' new #drone simulator map features a highly interactive #Mars Surface Environment ripe with learning opportunities for #STEM students. For the very first time, this map arrives paired with an in-depth course packed with amazing STEM-filled lessons.

We are excited to introduce our Special Guest and Rocket Scientist, Jasmine LeFlore, MSE, MBA

Join DroneBlocks instructor Clinton Evans as he works with Jasmine LeFlore, MSE, MBA from Greater Than Tech to inspect the rockets on Mars using drones!

Major Update for Android & iOS Devices!

Make sure your apps are up to date today! DroneBlocks apps for Android and iOS now offer manual flight controls for Tello series drones. This new feature is called "Virtual Sticks". It's time to put an end to switching between apps during class!

WHAT ARE VIRTUAL STICKS?
Using the on-screen joysticks from within the app, the virtual sticks send commands in real-time such as pitch, roll, yaw, and throttle to the drone just as a drone pilot would using the sticks on a larger remote-controlled drone.

HOW DO I GET THIS FEATURE?
Simply update your DroneBlocks apps on your Android / iOS devices to the latest version and click on the menu on the right side of the screen to reveal the new feature.

Questions? Send us an email at support@droneblocks.io, we will be happy to help.

Newsletter: https://lnkd.in/eNT57feR

company_updates_collection.reshared_post_author_headline: DroneBlocks, bringing drones to classrooms globally.
company_updates_collection.reshared_post_description:
Robot Dogs in the Classroom Just Became Accessible!

In-Stock NOW at DroneBlocks! Educators can now introduce a mobile robotic dog equipped with cutting-edge technology into any K12 #teaching environment, research, or development lab.

Dive into #AI. The DroneBlocks Quadruped combines all the functionalities of the most sophisticated #robotics systems with a discreet, agile profile, equipped with...

- An On-board Rasberry Pi
- 2 x Jetson Nanos + 1 Jetson NX
- 5 x Sets of fish-eye stereo depth cameras
- 3 x Sets of ultrasonic sensors

#Programmability. Learn to code with one of the most sophisticated robots available to schools.

- #C++
- #Python
- #ROS
- #Node-RED

Interested in Lidar? Advanced 3D & 2D #Lidar sensor attachments are also available to take your program to the next level.

Learn more today: https://lnkd.in/eyXBJyc2

Have you seen the new Mars environment in the DroneBlocks Simulator?

There are so many engaging possibilities in our new simulator!

Learn More: https://lnkd.in/eVW_rc49

Welcome to the #future! With the help of DroneBlocks, teachers can now introduce a mobile #robotic dog equipped with cutting-edge #technology into any #K12 teaching environment!

🚨 Curriculum Updates 🚨

New lessons & challenges are available for both the #Python and #Sensor/#Arduino courses for the #Robomaster #Tello #Drones!

These courses are included in the DroneBlocks Enterprise Membership. Email us today to enroll your school!

company_updates_collection.reshared_post_description:
Nothing excites the team at DroneBlocks like #community growth and participation in developing amazing #STEM learning tools such as the DroneBlocks Simulator. Since its release last year, the #Drone #Simulator has become a favorite among educators, and a conductor of great exercises and productive feedback.

Learn more about the latest updates: https://lnkd.in/gRywfm7i

company_updates_collection.description:
DroneBlocks is excited to announce its latest tech-forward partnership with databot.usa! 

#Databot is a small, #programmable device, chocked full of science sensors that can retrieve and record data that is fun and digestible for students and #educators alike.

Databot is compact and rugged enough to mount easily onto any Tello Drone without inhibiting its flight. With 16 data sensors, the databot returns after a paired #Drone mission beaming with reconnaissance information regarding the Physics data of the flight, Biology metrics, Chemistry measurements, and much more.

DroneBlocks customers will be able to instantly take advantage of the all-new databot curriculum module sponsored by Databot USA. DroneBlocks sponsored databot mission modules are also in the works, scheduled to release this summer.

- Newsletter: https://lnkd.in/gmQ-YbfZ
- Blog: https://lnkd.in/gmxCfviv
- Curriculum: https://lnkd.in/g2usvBuc
- Shop Now: https://lnkd.in/ggXvxPTa

company_updates_collection.reshared_post_author_headline: Curriculum Specialist | Full Stack Web Developer | ICT Engineer
company_updates_collection.reshared_post_description:
Last year I had the amazing opportunity to start building out some stem courses for DroneBlocks. The latest "Getting Started Guide" is on YouTube for educators around the world to use and enjoy. Drones not only engage the students on a whole new level, but they are small robots that fly. How cool is that? 

I am especially excited for the new wave of #educators embracing #stem via coding with #drones and DroneBlocks! I can't wait to meet you all and give you the tools you need to help your students take STEM/STEAM to the skies! 

I know everyone is buzzing about ChatGPT, but can it fly? No. It can't. 
Well not yet anyways. 

 https://lnkd.in/gzw-JFYy

company_updates_collection.reshared_post_author_headline: Computer Science Education Specialist at Texas Advanced Computing Center (TACC)
company_updates_collection.reshared_post_description: Loved coding drones with 1st and 2nd graders today! Thank you DroneBlocks for a great tool to use with any subject at any grade level! Today we reinforced math skills (measurement…used yardsticks for this activity) coupled with learning to write a computer program.  Students loved it…teacher loved it (she even said “Thank you for showing me an example of how to use a drone in the classroom….I’ve always thought of it as a toy…not an educational tool.”)…fun, engaging learning was had by all! #Coding #DroneBlocks #CS4All #MathSkills

DEXI is a fully programmable and customizable drone that students will build from scratch. Developed in collaboration with ARK Electronics, DEXI introduces a groundbreaking all-in-one flight controller that integrates optical flow sensing and onboard computing capabilities, fully compliant with NDAA and Section 889 regulations.

🚀 Did You Know DroneBlocks Offers a Commercial Drone Program? Here's How We Can Help Your School!

The drone industry is rapidly expanding, and at DroneBlocks, we're passionate about equipping the next generation with the skills they need to soar in this dynamic field. Why should high schools consider commercial drone training? It's simple: to give students a competitive edge in a high-growth industry.

🎓 Introducing Our Custom Commercial Drone Training Program for High Schools:

🔹 FAA Part 107 Certification: This mandatory certification is your students' ticket to commercial drone operations. Our program doesn't just prepare them to pass the exam; it opens the door to lucrative and exciting careers.

🔹 Hands-On Experience: Students train with industry-leading drones used by professionals, bridging the gap between theoretical learning and practical application.

🔹 Curriculum: We offer over 135 engaging lessons that cover everything from weather patterns to FAA regulations, tailored to the unique needs of each school.

🔹Customizable Packages: We work closely with schools to create custom solutions tailored to their needs and goals.

🔹 Real-World Skills: From drone safety and mission planning to business acumen, our students learn to navigate the real-world challenges of drone operations.

👩🏫 Partner with DroneBlocks: Bring real-world experience into the classroom, ensuring that your program is not only comprehensive but also cutting-edge. We're committed to making drone education accessible and impactful for all schools.

Ready to elevate your school’s drone program and set your students on a clear path to success in the drone industry?

📞 Schedule a call with a DroneBlocks education specialist today and discover how our tailored packages can transform your students' futures.

Our inaugural Uplift Education - Uplift Wisdom TechExpo yesterday was electric — and the love from the business and tech community? Absolutely unmatched. 

Our scholars had the chance to connect with innovators from across the region, and the excitement was contagious for everyone involved. From hands-on VR demos with SmartVR and Nexrage Studios Custom Software, to the incredible robots from RobotLab sparking curiosity about the future of tech-human interaction, and innovators like Book.io showing application of technologies that are changing the conversation around blockchain and digital assets. Every moment was designed to ignite confidence and wonder.

Panel discussions dove into tech in business, AI, cybersecurity, digital assets, and the future of technology, giving students a front-row seat to the possibilities ahead.

Huge thanks to our amazing partners who made this event unforgettable:
Philanthropy Kids, Collins Aerospace, Dallas Mavericks, AT&T, BlackRaven Advisors, U.S. Secret Service, Texas Department of Public Safety, DroneBlocks, Drone3D.io.io, Stuff.io, Spacee, Inc., AI CONNEX, and many more.

Special shoutout to LaKesha Raynor, CCT for her mentorship of our scholars and the incredible video of the event! 

The Erik Jonsson School of Engineering and Computer Science at UT Dallas, #UTDesign, and #UTDcapstone — your presence and leadership was inspiring for our scholars. And thank you to the Naveen Jindal School of Management, UT Dallas, especially student entrepreneur Jackson Halvorsen and Bob Wright Social Entrepreneurship students, for showing our scholars what tech innovation and purpose-driven business really look like.
We’re also incredibly grateful for the team at Uplift Education who helped bring this to life: LT Hunt and Toya D. Releford, Emily Painter, and our Uplift RTCC - Alumni Career Services team. And thank you Daniel Gray for your  support in making this event a reality! To Dr. Galvan, Bri, Simone and the Leadership of the Uplift Wisdom team, thank you.

Finally, a huge thank-you to Tech Titans STEM Outreach — your mentoring and real-world insight brought inspiration to every corner of our network.
Thank you all for showing up, speaking truth, and helping our students dream bigger.

#UpliftTech25 #MentorshipMatters #FutureReady #TechForGood #UpliftWisdom
